raw_body: Mrs A.R.C.C. Mortier (ANNE),​ It is with great sadness that we announce the demise of Mrs A.R.C.C. Mortier (Anne),​ beloved wife of Bunty,​ precious mother of Michelle,​ Rochelle,​ late Dreno & Jason. Remains lie at ‘The Restpect Home’ (by Jayaratne’s) Borella for viewing on Thursday,​ 11th January 2024 from 5.30 p.m. onwards. Cortege leaves ‘The Restpect’ (by Jayaratne’s) on Friday 12th January,​ at 3.00 p.m. for Burial at General Cemetery Borella (Roman Catholic Section). Australian & Canadian Newspapers please copy. +94773247759,​ +94114879560.003006
